llm_topic_proposal_raw.motivation: The article discusses a proposed city-run grocery store initiative by NYC mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani, which could significantly impact local food prices and the grocery market structure, warranting a new node to analyze its macroeconomic implications.
llm_topic_proposal_raw.name: NYC City-Run Grocery Stores

topic_category.motivation: Reduce food insecurity and lower grocery costs

relevance_gate.reason: Local city policy on grocery stores is too granular and not a macro driver or policy regime affecting broader markets.
